statements: SELECT * FROM water_quality_levels
SELECT region_name, water_quality_index FROM water_quality_levels WHERE pollution_level > 5
SELECT region_name, pollution_level FROM water_quality_levels ORDER BY region_name DESC
SELECT * FROM water_quality_levels WHERE water_quality_index BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT region_id, region_name, water_quality_index, pollution_level FROM water_quality_levels WHERE region_id = 3
SELECT * FROM water_quality_levels
SELECT region_name, water_quality_index FROM water_quality_levels WHERE water_quality_index > 80
SELECT * FROM water_quality_levels WHERE pollution_level < 5.0 ORDER BY region_name DESC
SELECT region_id, region_name AS 'Region Name', water_quality_index AS 'Quality Index' FROM water_quality_levels
SELECT AVG(water_quality_index) AS 'Average Quality Index' FROM water_quality_levels
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityLevels
SELECT region_id, water_quality_level FROM WaterQualityLevels ORDER BY water_quality_level DESC
SELECT region_id, AVG(water_quality_level) AS avg_quality FROM WaterQualityLevels GROUP BY region_id
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Regions WHERE region_name LIKE '%North%'
SELECT COUNT(region_id) AS total_regions FROM Regions
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityLevels WHERE water_quality_level > 7.5 ORDER BY region_id ASC
SELECT region_name, water_quality_level FROM Regions JOIN WaterQualityLevels ON Regions.region_id = WaterQualityLevels.region_id WHERE region_name LIKE 'North%'
SELECT AVG(water_quality_level) AS avg_quality FROM WaterQualityLevels
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityLevels WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT region_name, MAX(water_quality_level) AS max_quality FROM Regions JOIN WaterQualityLevels ON Regions.region_id = WaterQualityLevels.region_id GROUP BY region_name
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityRegions;
SELECT region_name, water_quality_level FROM WaterQualityRegions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PollutionSources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT reading_id, water_quality_level, reading_date FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE region_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityRegions
SELECT region_name, water_quality_level FROM WaterQualityRegions WHERE water_quality_level = 'Good'
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM PollutionSources ORDER BY source_type ASC
SELECT region_name, AVG(reading_date) AS avg_reading_date FROM WaterQualityReadings GROUP BY region_name
SELECT r.region_name, COUNT(ws.source_id) AS num_sources FROM WaterQualityRegions r LEFT JOIN PollutionSources ws ON r.region_id = ws.region_id GROUP BY r.region_name ORDER BY num_sources DESC
SELECT * FROM Regions;
SELECT region_name FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM WaterSources WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT test_date, test_result FROM WaterTests WHERE quality_id = 2 ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, quality_level FROM WaterSources JOIN WaterQualityLevels ON WaterSources.source_id = WaterQualityLevels.quality_id;
SELECT * FROM Regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, quality_level FROM WaterSources JOIN WaterQualityLevels ON WaterSources.region_id = WaterQualityLevels.quality_id;
SELECT test_id, test_result, test_date FROM WaterTests WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, region_name FROM WaterSources JOIN Regions ON WaterSources.region_id = Regions.region_id WHERE Regions.region_name = 'North';
SELECT MAX(quality_id) AS max_quality_id, MIN(quality_id) AS min_quality_id FROM WaterQualityLevels;
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM Region;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM WaterSource;
SELECT quality_level, timestamp FROM WaterQuality WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM MonitoringStation ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Region WHERE region_name = 'North'
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_location FROM WaterSource WHERE region_id = 2 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT quality_id, quality_level, timestamp FROM WaterQuality WHERE quality_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM PollutionData WHERE pollution_type IN ('Chemical', 'Biological') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM MonitoringStation ORDER BY station_name
